mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET leaveDate = NOW() WHERE uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.mainImg FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `productimg` AS b ON a.pno = b.pno LEFT JOIN `seller` AS c ON a.sid = c.uid WHERE b.mainImg IS NOT NULL AND b.deldate IS NULL ORDER BY a.rdate DESC, a.pno ASC

SELECT o.*, p.pno, p.cate, p.pname, p.company, pi.mainimg, od.pcount, od.options, od.price FROM `orders` AS o JOIN `orderdetail` AS od ON o.ono = od.ono JOIN `product` AS p ON p.pno = od.pno JOIN `productimg` AS pi ON p.pno = pi.pno WHERE p.deldate IS NULL

SELECT od.pno, pi.mainImg, p.pname, p.cate, SUM(od.pcount) AS pcount, SUM(od.price) AS price FROM `orderdetail` AS od INNER JOIN `product` AS p ON od.pno = p.pno INNER JOIN `productimg` AS pi ON od.pno = pi.pno INNER JOIN `orders` AS o ON od.ono = o.ono WHERE p.deldate IS NULL GROUP BY od.pno ORDER BY od.pno

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(od.pcount) AS pcount, SUM(o.total) AS price, DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%y-%m') AS period FROM `orderdetail` AS od JOIN `orders` AS o ON od.ono = o.ono GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%y-%m') ORDER BY period DESC LIMIT 12 )limit_row ORDER BY period ASC

SELECT c.cname AS pname, SUM(od.pcount) AS pcount FROM orderdetail AS od JOIN product AS p ON p.pno = od.pno JOIN category AS c ON p.cate = c.cate WHERE p.deldate IS NULL GROUP BY p.cate ORDER BY pcount DESC LIMIT 3
